channel.title: CVE Feed for Fortinet -- Fortinet FortiProxy
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Fortinet -- Fortinet FortiProxy

item.title: CVE-2021-22128|2024-08-03T18:30:24.008Z -- fortinet -- fortinet%20fortiproxy
item.description: An improper access control vulnerability in FortiProxy SSL VPN portal 2.0.0, 1.2.9 and below versions may allow an authenticated, remote attacker to access internal service such as the ZebOS Shell on the FortiProxy appliance through the Quick Connection functionality.

item.title: CVE-2021-22130|2024-08-03T18:30:24.006Z -- fortinet -- fortinet%20fortiproxy
item.description: A stack-based buffer overflow vulnerability in FortiProxy physical appliance CLI 2.0.0 to 2.0.1, 1.2.0 to 1.2.9, 1.1.0 to 1.1.6, 1.0.0 to 1.0.7 may allow an authenticated, remote attacker to perform a Denial of Service attack by running the `diagnose sys cpuset` with a large cpuset mask value. Fortinet is not aware of any successful exploitation of this vulnerability that would lead to code execution.
